title: Deciphering trust in grassroots government for vibrant resident participation in neighborhood regeneration: An empirical study in China's top-down governance system
content:

Source: Cities, Volume 152

Author(s): Guiwen Liu, Yuhang Zhang, Taozhi Zhuang, Hexin Yi, Zijun Cao, Hongjuan Wu, Xinyue Fu
